MS.S: This script uses WMI to retrieve properties needed for a customer to register a device with Windows Autopilot. Note that it is normal for the resulting CSV file to not collect a Windows Product ID (PKID) value since this is not required to register a device. Only the serial number and hardware hash will be populated.

Version 1.0: Original published version._x000A_Version 1.1: Added -Append switch._x000A_Version 1.2: Added -Credential switch._x000A_Version 1.3: Added -Partner switch._x000A_Version 1.4: Switched from Get-WMIObject to Get-CimInstance._x000A_Version 1.5: Added -GroupTag parameter._x000A_Version 1.6: Bumped version number (no other change)._x000A_Version 2.0: Added -Online parameter._x000A_Version 2.1: Bug fix._x000A_Version 2.3: Updated comments._x000A_Version 2.4: Updated "online" import logic to wait for the device to sync, added new parameter._x000A_Version 2.5: Added AssignedUser for Intune importing, and AssignedComputerName for online Intune importing._x000A_Version 2.6: Added support for app-based authentication via Connect-MSGraphApp._x000A_Version 2.7: Added new Reboot option for use with -Online -Assign._x000A_Version 2.8: Fixed up parameter sets._x000A_Version 2.9: Fixed typo installing AzureAD module._x000A_Version 3.0: Fixed typo for app-based auth, added logic to explicitly install NuGet (silently)._x000A_Version 3.2: Fixed logic to explicitly install NuGet (silently)._x000A_Version 3.3: Added more logging and error handling for group membership._x000A_Version 3.4: Added logic to verify that devices were added successfully. Fixed a bug that could cause all Autopilot devices to be added to the specified AAD group._x000A_Version 3.5: Added logic to display the serial number of the gathered device._x000A_Version 3.6: Switch from MSGraph to MgGraph._x000A_Version 3.7: Switching back to using Write-Host._x000A_Version 3.8: AddToGroup dependencies fixed._x000A_Version 3.9: Expand MgGraph scopes and enforce minimum version for WindowsAutoPilotIntune module.

This script uses WMI to retrieve properties needed for a customer to register a device with Windows Autopilot. Note that it is normal for the resulting CSV file to not collect a Windows Product ID (PKID) value since this is not required to register a device. Only the serial number and hardware hash will be populated.

Version 1.0: Original published version._x000A_Version 1.1: Added -Append switch._x000A_Version 1.2: Added -Credential switch._x000A_Version 1.3: Added -Partner switch._x000A_Version 1.4: Switched from Get-WMIObject to Get-CimInstance._x000A_Version 1.5: Added -GroupTag parameter._x000A_Version 1.6: Bumped version number (no other change)._x000A_Version 2.0: Added -Online parameter._x000A_Version 2.1: Bug fix._x000A_Version 2.3: Updated comments._x000A_Version 2.4: Updated "online" import logic to wait for the device to sync, added new parameter._x000A_Version 2.5: Added AssignedUser for Intune importing, and AssignedComputerName for online Intune importing._x000A_Version 2.6: Added support for app-based authentication via Connect-MSGraphApp._x000A_Version 2.7: Added new Reboot option for use with -Online -Assign._x000A_Version 2.8: Fixed up parameter sets._x000A_Version 2.9: Fixed typo installing AzureAD module._x000A_Version 3.0: Fixed typo for app-based auth, added logic to explicitly install NuGet (silently)._x000A_Version 3.2: Fixed logic to explicitly install NuGet (silently)._x000A_Version 3.3: Added more logging and error handling for group membership._x000A_Version 3.4: Added logic to verify that devices were added successfully. Fixed a bug that could cause all Autopilot devices to be added to the specified AAD group._x000A_Version 3.5: Added logic to display the serial number of the gathered device._x000A_Version 3.6: Switch from MSGraph to MgGraph._x000A_Version 3.7: Switching back to using Write-Host._x000A_Version 3.8: AddToGroup dependencies fixed._x000A_Version 3.9: Expand MgGraph scopes and enforce minimum version for WindowsAutoPilotIntune module.
